website_summaries.verdict: A throwback in terms of style, with modern touches such as ports that can charge your devices, and room to spare.
pros: Customers appreciate the vintage backpack look that delivers design texture along with the things we expect from a 21st Century backpack
Charges phones and also provides more than ample space for a laptop and books
cons: Customers report the straps require constant readjustment

customer_reviews.title: Made my 15.6' laptop seem light
customer_reviews.text: In love with this backpack. Quality is really nice with thick fabric. I have a 15.6" laptop, and my old backpack made it seem so heavy. After I started using this one, it seemed so light! I didn't think that it would be possible! The charger is great and charges my phone perfectly since I usually carry a power bank with me. I love the 3 compartments since it helps me organize my things. Absolutely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great for hauling work laptop
customer_reviews.text: Love the backpack for hauling my laptop back and forth to work. Only two small complaints. The straps tend to come apart or not stay at the length you want because the straps are smaller than the bracket. Other thing is the compartment for your laptop is quit large for modern laptops, so my laptop isn't as secure as I would like and things tend to fall in that pocket, which could scratch it. Like I said small complaints and I still love the backpack. Color is great and love the charging port on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin long

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Just used it today it’s very nice and spacious. Hopefully it will last!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Love the backpack!
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is great! Is price is cheap, but high quality! Is everything I needed in a backpack. Great for high school and college!
customer_reviews.author: José cubilla

customer_reviews.title: Quality beats the price , I'm in love !
customer_reviews.text: It looks so pretty , just what I need it , blank , business/sleek style .... ON BUDGET. My 15" laptop fits great , don't even have to put a cover since the laptop compartment is well padded. Feels comfy on my back , I fill up with so much crap I was surprised. I just took a 4 days trip and it fit all I need it !. I'm 32" back and 5'7 , I tought the back was a little too big for back but it works fine .
customer_reviews.author: melissa almeida

customer_reviews.title: Slick backpack and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love this backpack best purchase ever. This backpack fits all my needs. I can fit my iPad, iPhone, lunch bag, make up bag, wallet and a pair of clothes. Also has a separate section for my external batteries which I love. Pro side: I like thin looking backpacks and this backpack has that slick appearance with plenty of space. Down side: with my external battery I don’t use the the outside port for it I found it inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer x

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Used for almost 2 months until the black clip broke making the strap unusable. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: jls

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price I've had it for a little over a month and nothing is wearing out or not working the way it was when I first recieved it!
customer_reviews.author: C.M.Watson

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Smell
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has a strong chemical smell that isn't going away after 2 months of leaving it open, washing & drying it 4 times, leaving it out in the sun, leaving it in the cold outside air. & inside the warm house. The smell is strong enough to fill the air in a room. Unfortunately, I'm unable use it due to the smell. The good news is it looks nice and holds its shape after multiple washes.
customer_reviews.author: Myshell

customer_reviews.title: First use and the strap broke
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Was excited to receive my bad and my first use of it the strap broke, while I was on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this backpack! Very nice looking, good quality, lots of pockets, sturdy construction. Laptop fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute... great for carrying my laptop. Perfect size. The only negative is the fabric is very smelly (chemical smell). Other than that, it’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality but not the room
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has a really good quality material. Meaning, it is strong and long lasting. I initially bought it for traveling but the room inside of it is so limited! The only thing that will fit in this backpack is your loptop and other small essentiasls you will need during the flight. It is also somewhat bulky and thick. I do love it for school however, it fits a large binder and a few other notebooks and a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking backpack. It fits my 15" laptop and a lot more. I love how organized you can be with all the pockets and sections. I had it on in the rain the other day and nothing inside got wet. I'd say you could easily store a compter, books, a change of clothes, a couple water bottles and all your little lotions, keys, etc in this thing without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for my laptop. The cable folds up nicely into the side pocket and I can put my cell in the other while charging. I’ve gotten quite a few compliments on it. Very stylish and professional for a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I went back to college this semester and didn't want a childish backpack since I'm a grown woman and this bag is just perfect. I'll have to admit I haven't used the charger because I never need it, the school has chargers everywhere but i want to attest to the high quality if this bag. I carry my laptop, my books, make up bag, Pen's bag, notebooks, etc. In it and so far, not a single problem. It's also very comfortable to wear with the padded straps and it's very beautiful, much better than in photos. If I'm wearing a suit or a dress I don't look like I'm wearing my kids' bag.
customer_reviews.author: RomanticGoat

customer_reviews.title: Best Computer back pack ever
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was even nicer than I expected. Water resistant quality material is tough but with a nice feel. Roomy and light. I can fit everything I need. I bought this for college and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyreadalot

customer_reviews.title: A true fashionable work backpack- Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this all the time. My job requires me to bring my laptop home every night and it fits perfect inside. There is also enough space to bring home work folders. I also travel occasionally and this laptop back is great for that. I put my laptop, ipad and my small purse all in here so I just have this and my wheeled carryon. I love the look of the gray. Most others I tried were not feminine enough. I wanted it to be feminine but not scream it. Love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: kcmomma

customer_reviews.title: Loving This Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely loving this bag! I was going back and forth between a few different options and I’m glad I settled on this. It actually holds a lot. I used it as a carry on for a trip and I ended up having to stuff extra items in it because my luggage was overweight and it held up like a dream. I will be attending law school in the fall and I think this will be perfect to carry my computer and books!
customer_reviews.author: Maquillaje by Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Backpack!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this backpack. Its very stylish! I've gotten a few compliments on it. It fits what I need. I have yet to use the charging cord, so I can't say it if works or not. It does not come with a battery but I have one and it fits the slot nicely. Again a really great backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Ninjagrl1

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy and comfortable! I bought this for my daughter for a school backpack. She is a sophomore in high school and is very hard on her backpacks. We are in the last weeks of school and it still looks brand new. The straps are padded and very comfortable to wear. Definitely a great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Eschete

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Thick material and plenty of room! My other bag broke due to the weight of my college books but I don't see this one retiring any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dii Fusco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect college bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for college- holds as much as I need it too, wears comfortably while crossing campus. Easy to access water holders on side. Mostly I appreciate the lack of fancy zippers all over the front going in different directions. Also the top flap is perfectly thick for protection of contents and works marvelous for displaying enamel pins. Worth the buy. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag for my work laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very durable, waterproof outer, and has a nice cord hole for chargers, headphones, etc. It's got plenty of room for my laptop (15.6") and notebooks, pens, and other equipment. I haven't traveled extensively with it, but it seems comfortable and it's lightweight enough to be a handy travel bag, too. Very happy with the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: It even fits MORE
customer_reviews.text: Huge and comfortable!! I could throw in a bulky sweatshirt
customer_reviews.author: Diana Bechara

customer_reviews.title: I get so many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this backpack for 6 months now and it's been great! I get a ton of compliments and no one believes that this came from Amazon for such a low price. I also recently tried the USB charger that comes with it and it also works great for charging my phone or wireless headphones. It works perfectly as an everyday backpack and for overnight travel. Looking to buy one for my husband as well!
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute backpack!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this backpack!! I get compliments on it wherever I go, too. The inside isn’t huge, but it’s perfect for me. The charging takes some wiggling to get the cords just right, but it’s such a neat feature. I took it on a cruise and in a little rain and all my stuff was protected. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Well-made backpack for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Did very extensive search for a backpack for law school and settled on this one. Overall very satisfied. Comfortable straps, fashionable without being cutsie, two sizable pockets on either side (fits mini umbrella and large water bottle perfectly), durable material, sizeable inner pocket. My only two reasons for not giving it five stars: It is not large enough to fit more than one textbook with my notebook, binder, and laptop and there are *tons* of tiny pockets on the inside that get caught on the corners of my textbooks when I'm trying to slide them in. Great if you need additional storage of small items but inconvenient if you don't
customer_reviews.author: Julia P

customer_reviews.title: Missing magnetic closures
customer_reviews.text: The book bag did not include closures or the batter charge pack for us charger of devices. It feels like it was rushed off the assembly line with a few pieces missing.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product ... don’t hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Very functional and has good styling. Exactly what I was looking for. Has a good number of pockets for what I need. Could use a few more but I am happy. People complained about a smell, I am very sensitive to smells and it smells fine to me. It smells like new furniture. I like the smell of new carpet , new furniture and new cars, some people don’t.
customer_reviews.author: JL Miller

customer_reviews.title: Was good up until the tear :(
customer_reviews.text: Was loving this backpack until I noticed it's beginning to tear. The medium sized pocket is ripping in the corner where I only my keys and wallet and nothing more. So I dont understand why it's ripping when 1. I don't use this bag everyday and it's been less than 2 months and 2. Nothing heavy goes inside of this pocket. Extremely disappointed. The water resistance is great. Got caught in downpour and not a drop of water got through. Not too big and bulky. Looks just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: I Am Her

customer_reviews.title: Reliable for traveling....
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this backpack but had to get another one due to it raining and water seeping through the backpack. It ruined one of my library books unfortunately. Definitely recommend this bag if you live somewhere without crazy and unpredictable weather like the Midwest 😝
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Practically Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really love this backpack! It usually never rains where I live, but it did in the first month that I got this backpack, and absolutely none of my school things got wet. The backpack is really comfortable too! I hardly even notice the weight. My one complaint is that the water bottle pockets are a little bit of a tight fit. I have a small water bottle, and sometimes it's a bit of a struggle to fit the bottle into place. Most of the time, though, it's all fine. I haven't used the portable charger yet, but it seems good! the cable came with the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Buy this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is absolutely amazing! I was looking for a backpack for college that had a laptop pocket in it, and ended up with a backpack that had a laptop pocket, a tablet pocket, a place to put your portable charger, 2 side pockets, and lots of little pockets to put little things in. I carry feminine hygiene products, tissues, pens and pencils, charging cords for my phone and laptop, lots of things!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for travel this summer, must say it is very stylish as I received quite a few compliments from it. I used this through airports, I have TSA pre-check, but in smaller airports where it wasn't available it was easy to get my laptop in and out from it's designated slot. I am currently in school again and can get my laptop in, my ipad pro, the DSM-5 and 2 other textbooks. The different compartments are very nice and allow for quick stow of cell phone/ lotion/ bottles of water. I would buy backpack this again and I am happy with my selection.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: You just can't go wrong buying this bag. Great price, great product. I bought it for college. It holds a lot, my books, laptop and notebook. It has a power pack pocket, earphones pocket, a pocket for wallet etc. I even have my meds and first aid kit in it. Its durable material. Today it rained and nothing on the inside got wet. The straps are comfortable enough to avoid having shoulder pain. However, if you add too much weight it can cause pain but only because of the weight. I had bought a waterproof tote bag before and it began to rip everywhere. This backpack doesnt rip. Total investment.
customer_reviews.author: G-Cast

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, but not huge, comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very sturdy and well made. It isn't large, BUT it is spacious. I am a caregiver who is also breastfeeding so I lug my work things AND breast pump to work every day and this bag is great for that. The straps are wide and comfortable! It is also cute! There is a bit of a plastic/chemical smell as mentioned in other reviews, but it isn't too noticeable during normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this backpack all the time. I splashed red drink on it the other day and it beaded up and wiped right off! The only thing I wish is that it came with whatever battery you would need to be able to use the phone charger port thing. I’m not too tech savvy and would have liked instructions on that.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Correll

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and great for those who are clumsy!
customer_reviews.text: So I used this backpack for an 8 day cruise this year. I am a super clumsy person. I had a thing of wine in my bag and when taking it out I spilled some getting it out of the backpack, so it spilled on the outside of the bag. It came off almost completely, the only part that stained is the part I missed when wiping it down and it sat for a couple hours before I noticed those spots. It is still in perfect condition. I have a feeling this will be my go to bag over the next handful of years.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Weak zipper
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this back in April. Here we are less than a year later and I’m looking to purchase a new backpack. It barely held together during my trip to France and I was hoping to get a new bag in the airport on my way out but did not have time then, nor on my way back into the US. The zipper started becoming a problem back in December. I was hoping that by buying a production here with great reviews would prevent from having to buy a new bag every year, alas this was not that bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia I.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I bought it for a trip to Chicago for work and it was totally perfect. It is very roomy and has just the right amount of pockets. The side pockets were perfect for my water bottle and my umbrella. The sleek design and classic fabric was professional. My laptop fit perfectly and made it through TSA and the full flight with no problems. This is definitely a product I would recommend to others and would purchase again myself.
customer_reviews.author: M. Andreasen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit a lot, heavy
customer_reviews.text: So, this book bag is ONLY pretty to look at which is why I gave it 2 stars lol. It does NOT fit a whole lot, the flap which goes over the top serves absolutely no purpose except to go over the top zipper, plus this flap's got some weight to it...useless. The zipper designs are very annoying to me, because they keep getting stuck in weird positions. Personally, I believe all bookbags should have double zippers for every zipper pocket, but the only area where there's a double zipper is in the main cavern. I wish this book bag was less heavy and fit a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: LAI CHU WONG

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: i took this bag on a cruise. The storage was great and I took it everywhere and shared it was also with my Husband. Two Gentleman with expensive taste on the cruise asked where we got it because they were enamored with the bag. Also asked If we would sell them ours because he Liked it better then the one in the store that was similar and cost $99.00. I i refereed them to Amazon, I wasn’t parting with it, you know when you have something good!
customer_reviews.author: Denise B

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend this bookbag
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bookbag! Fits my laptop, journal, calendar planner notebook, mini journal, and thick a** arch notebook (along with some lotion lol) in the main compartment..and the odds and ends like charger mouse more pens etc in the smaller compartments. All while keeping a nice upright form which helps with the organization of it instead of slouching with no structure like other bags AND the way the bookbag holds the weight makes it feel waayyy lighter than it has in any other bookbag I've used when I pick it up! This is awesome I definitely recommend it! 5 stars all around!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a flash sale b/c fb I wanted something a little bigger then what I had. It’s a great size for me and fits everything and then some. Great when I’m dodging rain or snow because my stuff stays dry. Charger works fine and is easy to use. It is black inside and my thing seem to get lost in the black hole but other than that I like it. Have gotten a few compliments on it as well!
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pack to commute to work. The backpack is nicely padded to carry a laptop, with plenty of extra room. However, the chemical smell is terrible. Other reviewers had mentioned this problem, but I dismissed the warning. I’ve washed and dried it twice, but it hasn’t gotten much better. The smell is particularly bad on the inside of the pack. The price was very good, but I would not have bought it if I had realized how awful the smell was.
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: Stinks - not durable
customer_reviews.text: When this backpack arrived it has an awful “factory” smell to it. I saw that others had cleaned with a wipe and others washed. I tried the wipe first and it wouldn’t go away. Washed it and it still stinks! The worst part is it ripped in the washer! Never got to wear it. I wouldn’t purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! I got the all black one maybe 2 years ago and everywhere I went people complemented me on it. I used it for my art and drawing classes to transport my drawing books, assignments, drawing utensils, paint and computer stuff. It can support a whole lot. My 16 yr old daughter decided she wanted the same bag, so I got the newer black bag with brown flaps and gave her my old one. It still looks amazing and she was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top quality!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backpack. It is the perfect size for a college student who has a laptop and multiple books to carry around from class to class. Like it mentions on the description it is water resistant and I can vouch for that. I also love all the details that it has inside for example the USB outlet that lets you charge items while on-the-go (keep one mind a portable charger has to be purchased to be able to do the latter).
customer_reviews.author: Macarena Sedano Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lightweight but roomy backpack, and this has completely fit what I was looking for. The pockets are great for holding the stuff I need to carry, and there's room for for my small tablet as well as my full-size laptop when I need to carry both. I wear this backpack to work now instead of carrying a purse, and it's much easier on my back. Overall, very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Even better than expected! The material is thick and very durable. The shoulder straps are very well padded and has spacious compartments. There is even a pocket inside if you wanted to put a water bottle you could (just to give you an idea the size of the pocket). Also there is a compartment for laptop/iPad. I would definitely order this again!
customer_reviews.author: Mama bear

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and good amount of storage space LoL
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag the light grey color is the best color choice honestly the bag feels good and the magnetic belt thing that closes the bag is sooo satisfying. If you have an airpod and you know how you close it and it makes that click? Even better.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic backpack, I use it for my 17.5 inch laptop. Stitching stays strong after weeks of heavy use. Extremely water resistant but I still recommend wiping it down once you're out of the rain. Easy to bike with this on too.
customer_reviews.author: Roan Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Bag
customer_reviews.text: My husband was wanting a more masculine diaper bag and I found this. It works perfect! The only thing I didn't think about that I miss from my old bag was straps to attach it to the stroller. Once she is older we can easily transport her iPad in the bag as well as it has an interior pocket for electronics. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Seller
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this backpack is exactly as described in the listing. USB Charging works fantastic, holds most of my books, not all, but most. Then, it looks great, conforms to one's body well and had beautiful buttons. I did have a slight issues with mine, one of the buttons just came off for no obvious reason. For that, I contacted the seller about it, and he promptly just provided me a full refund and didn't even want me to send the backpack back in. The backpack was still usable, even with the one button clasp having came off, and for that, I still give the seller a 5 Star Rating, because of their amazing business quality model.
customer_reviews.author: BATTLESTAR SG-1

customer_reviews.title: More room than expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the sole purpose of traveling economy with united, which means no carry-ons. So far in my packing, I was able to fit more than three days worth of outfits, shoes, and toiletries. Even extra stuff like items I would normally carry in my purse. The straps are also very comfortable which is always a plus when walking around in airports. 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Everyday work bag, travel bag, and more.
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag every day to carry my work laptop and the 50 other things I always have in tow. I looked for this after traveling through airports with my laptop in my purse and having a sore shoulder not long after. I love the convenient pockets, I love the ability to hook up my portable battery charger, and after taking it on a personal trip where I had 2 young kids in tow, I like all of its conveniences. I have used it daily for almost 4 months and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Mennis

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. I commute to and from work 5 days a week, and I wanted something a bit cuter than a bookbag but durable and functional. This bag nailed it! It fits a lot without being bulky or uncomfortable. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great look
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pack. I havent tried the charging or headphone port yet, and prob wont. My only gripe is the fold over flap. Idk exactly what I dont like about it, but it's not a quick snap to close it. You have to line up and push hard when the bag dosent have much in it. Not a big deal, but could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique T.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and lots of room!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my Masters of Business program which involved international traveling and lots of professional networking events. IT IS WONDERFUL! I cannot stress enough how great of a product this is. It is cheap and very high quality, super comfortable, and a lot more room than it looks. I highly recommend this backpack for work, traveling, professional events, or college.
customer_reviews.author: LiAnn Seale

customer_reviews.title: Great for School
customer_reviews.text: I use this bookbag for college. It's great .It has a lot of space. I fit around my laptop, a 5 sub notebook, file folder, and a lot more. It didn't even hurt my bag. It's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Zehra

customer_reviews.title: Great for artists! A versatile sturdy bag & lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this to transport her art supplies, books, etc. (mostly heavy sketchbooks, pens, etc). She loads this pack up and it holds up beautifully. Lots of pockets. This worked much better than any art bag we could find marketed to artists. She loves this bag and I think this is a fantastic value for the wonderful quality and design. I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieDrag

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the backpack considering that you can put all your office essentials in there along with your laptop and it does make a good traveling backpack for other means.
customer_reviews.author: shiane

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really like this bag. It's very spacious and securely stores my 13" macbook air in the padded section with the added velcro strap. The bag stands on its own without toppling over and damaging contents. Love that it has two side pockets for beverages and of course the color is amazing! I initially bought this bag for the mini charging station but I removed the cords for now and would try at a later date. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Husbands Laptop Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband so he could travel with his laptop. He loves the size and space it provides. I will be purchasing one for my younger brother when he starts highschool.
customer_reviews.author: ShanShan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding all around backpack for techies
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backpack very high quality it seems rugged enough for somebody like me who was very good at breaking things, but this backpack is ideal for carrying around a lot of tech I have a lot of gadgets, and iPad and Lenovo tablet as well as my 13-inch laptop I have my mouse my iPad keyboard welcome pressure-sensitive pen as well as numerous chargers including portable power banks and this holds all of them with no issue as well as making my backpack fill extra light when carrying it around The straps are very secure and the design is amazing if I could I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: stanley

customer_reviews.title: Super spacious and good for school or travel
customer_reviews.text: Super spacious and my daughter loads it with four 2inch binders for school. She carries her water bottle on the side pocket which can fit tumblers and water bottles at ease on both side. Fabric is very high quality and doesnt tear or dirty easy either. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: asianwifey

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It is bigger than I was hoping (probably my fault for not paying attention) but it is amazing! I can’t use it for what I wanted to but I can use it for other things! It’s super cute
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, poorly executed.
customer_reviews.text: It would be a really nice bag if it wasn’t crooked. The flap drops towards the left and the zipper is sewn about half a cm too high on the left side of the front zipper (my mild OCD nature caught this and it bothers me). When you close the flap the discrepancy between the lengths of both sides is still noticeable. Also, not much storage space. It could fit one big textbook and a notebook OR 4 composition notebooks. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since it has the built in laptop sleeve and I liked the style. It feels super durable and has held up really well. I have a ton of room with my 14" laptop, 2 3subject notebooks, 2 folders, a planner, and a pencil pouch in it. I also have personal items in the front and can still add more if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelming chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but it smells so bad. I can't even keep it on the same room, and I bought it for work and can't even have it in a conference room with me because it's offensive. When I get to my car after work I have to put it in the trunk. I'm not being dramatic, I wish I read the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this backpack is amazing! Durable material, heavy duty zippers, comfortable sturdy straps, lots of pockets, tons of storage space, padded computer pocket (on two sides), and the style is fashionable. It’s perfect for work and travel.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Mueller

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST BAG EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom to celebrate her getting her first laptop. I lowkey think she loves this bag more than me. She brings this bag everywhere and has it stuffed to the max. She makes use of all the compartments in the bag. The only thing I think she hasn't used is the charging port which is kinda the main feature and reason for buying this bag besides the design.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Best work bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: Durable, fashionable, strong and perfectly sized. I use it for work but I'd recommend for students with heavy books. I commute so I'm thankful for the charging port. I just got one from Five Below, attached and BOOM...no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: ...but not water resistant. Medium rain and the stuff inside my bag was wet. I like it though and will keep it; just have to find a REALLY waterproof bag too
customer_reviews.author: lisa wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good size backpack. I would call this medium capacity. I'm a college student and carry a 1" binder, a laptop, and two spiral notebooks every day and they all fit snuggly inside -- anything beyond that would be too much. This would be a good backpack if you don't have to lug large textbooks and binders all the time.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I’ve travelled everywhere with it so comfortable and easy to wipe down when needed spilled soda all over it on the plane and everything inside was dry and able to wipe it down with no residual damage
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It is a very sturdy, well made backpack. However, I am very disappointed about capacity to hold my things. The pockets are very tight. I had hoped to use it for travel, but the front two pockets aren't large enough to hold my travel sized toiletries. The side pocket won't hold my water bottle. The main storage area will barely fit a weekend worth of clothing. It is too bulky to use as a school backpack, as it will not fit in a locker.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Tekubie

customer_reviews.title: Large bag. Lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for those who have lots to carry. Not only is their ample space for books, tablets, charging accessories, etc.., there is also space for drinking bottle and other odds and ins.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyj

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and water proof great value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice exterior and interior design. Organized well, has well concealed USB connector. This bag is totally water repellent. The top flap assures rainwater never reaches inside.
customer_reviews.author: Walter of Boston

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for mostly for my laptop when I travel or work from home. It’s incredibly spacious and lightweight. I love all of the compartments and places to store different things. This can be used for a quick flight to carry so much! I also love the ports for charging, makes things so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Jonas

customer_reviews.title: amazing storage
customer_reviews.text: i use this for school mainly (although i have taken it on a few trips) and capacity is truly impressive. i keep my laptop, two large textbooks, two smaller books, a 5 subject notebook, and a shit ton of random things in the front pockets. not to mention the water resistance it has when it rains, i never worry about my laptop being in there. i would recommend still putting your laptop in a case though bc even though there's space there's not much cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bookbag
customer_reviews.text: The bookbag is very sturdy and fits everything that I need. It does not come with a power bank in order to charge your phone, that has to be bought separately. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this backpack for a trip where this would be my only luggage. I now use it as my everyday "work backpack" and it's great! I am able to fit my daily odds and ends, lunch, and workout clothes into it easily. It fits on my back comfortably and doesn't take up too much space on public transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Poindextrix

customer_reviews.title: Don’t doubt this... BUY IT! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It is super sleek and stylish... there are many spacious compartments. I can fit SO much in this bag! I use it daily for nursing school and it is able to fit my daily essentials, 5+ books, laptop, extra clothes and still have space. I’m super happy I made this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jay R

customer_reviews.title: Awful chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: The backpack was really great and looked very nice, however there was an awful chemical odor that despite leaving it outside to air out and spray it with deodorizer that I could not get rid of. Ultimately I had to send it back because the smell was giving me a headache .
customer_reviews.author: Megan Helfrich

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited for this product and seemed to stand up to weather well. Huge storage capacity, but also very thick and bulkier empty so got heavy sometimes. Material got dirty kinda easily, but I did have it for a good bit of time so most of that is very normal. Really loved how much it could hold and I never had to worry about stuff fitting to take somewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: Works great got its as a gift and know she loves its will be getting me one soon 😃😃😃😃
customer_reviews.author: christal

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, use it for work. It holds notebooks,schedules, clothes, EVERYTHING. Only con is the small pockets inside are poorly stitched and with in a week they were ripping.
customer_reviews.author: Cmac

customer_reviews.title: wouldn’t buy again. broken after a month. *great customer service*
customer_reviews.text: the backpack is cute, but it’s smaller capacity than what I thought. also, after a month & a half, the zipper broke. so if you’re thinking of buying this, don’t. pay more for a backpack that won’t break so quick. EDIT: the company immediately reached out to me after my backpack broke & sent me a new one! great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: ShannonR

customer_reviews.title: Nice for nursing school
customer_reviews.text: Great size. It fits my 15.6 inch laptop. This is used for my clinical classes for nursing school. It does not have a lot of space, but I just need it for my stheoscope, BP cuff, and planner along with my laptop, and notepad
customer_reviews.author: Emily Braun

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I hate carrying a large purse to work to store all my many items. This backpack is sleek enough to be used in a professional environment and provides plenty of storage. Very happy, especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so many compliments
customer_reviews.text: This has held up very nicely and I get tons of compliments, it is a nice looking bag and it fits everything I need. The side pockets can get a little hard to use, if the bag is full but over all no complaints! It washes well
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag last month for my upcoming business trips. It fits a lot of stuff including my big laptop, I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: PenelopeRose

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The best backpack ever, my laptop fits perfectly, my keyboard, my mouse and the mousepad, a notebook and a few more things, is just exactly what i need! My husband got the black one too, and is perfect too!
customer_reviews.author: Lizeth Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and is with standing my rough life style
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this was a great surprise!! I get lots of compliments from people. I take it everywhere. It’s used like a man purse I guess. Tablet, notebooks, wallet, charger, and my meds are my main reason. I haven’t used the port for ear phones. But the rest works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. Not only is super stylish but it holds so much. I'm able to get both my 17" laptops, full size keyboard and paperwork inside. I've gotten a lot of compliments on the style and grey color. A must buy for school or work!
customer_reviews.author: KJH

customer_reviews.title: Laptop Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, even had a couple of positive comments when travelling. Could have been better if the zip allowed to open the whole bag. This would allow for better access when packing a few clothes when using for business travel. Otherwise so far appear well made and is standing up to daily 14 mile motorcycle commute.
customer_reviews.author: Rod C

customer_reviews.title: Love my bag!
customer_reviews.text: It's durable, neat, stands up nice and straight so I can slide my laptop in the protected pocket and has handy little pockets for everything and my charger for the phone/laptop! And it looks professional and casual for every day use. I commute to the city (2 hrs each way) and it makes my life a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Asenneth I,. Elsin

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice backpack! It won't carry as much as I need it to but it will carry a lot for a student. I was hoping to use it as a laptop bag for work. I have a laptop a large binder and a small binder along with two notebooks.
customer_reviews.author: Candis Holden
